gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Class MCTSplitPaneFactory

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui.MCTSplitPaneFactory

public class MCTSplitPaneFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a factory that creates arbitrarily nested split panes. This class is used to divide up the area of a parent component into multiple splittable areas to fit any number of interior panels.

Method Detail

createSplitPanes

public static javax.swing.JComponent createSplitPanes(java.awt.Container container,
                                                      java.util.List<javax.swing.JPanel> panels,
                                                      int orientation)
Creates a series of JSplitPane objects to hold the given panels, in a horizontal or vertical orientation. If the number of panels is n, we create n-1 instances of JSplitPane. The first holds the first panel and all the other JSplitPane instances, and so on recursively.

Parameters:
container - the container in which we will place the split panes
panels - the list of panels to split the container among
orientation - the orientation, horizontal or vertical
Returns:
a component that contains all the panels, organized into split panes
